        writeStyled
      • writeStyled(txt: string; style: set[Style] = {styleBright})

Modification of the terminal for keyboard reading without stdout.write duplicate fd is use Posix default FD = 0->(STDIN) the dup function gives the first free

Types

BackgroundColor = enum
  bgBlack = 40,             ## black
  bgRed,                    ## red
  bgGreen,                  ## green
  bgYellow,                 ## yellow
  bgBlue,                   ## blue
  bgMagenta,                ## magenta
  bgCyan,                   ## cyan
  bgWhite,                  ## white
  bgDefault                  ## default terminal background color
terminal's background colors 
ForegroundColor = enum
  fgBlack = 30,             ## black
  fgRed,                    ## red
  fgGreen,                  ## green
  fgYellow,                 ## yellow
  fgBlue,                   ## blue
  fgMagenta,                ## magenta
  fgCyan,                   ## cyan
  fgWhite,                  ## white
  fgDefault                  ## default terminal foreground color
terminal's foreground colors 
MouseButton {.pure.} = enum
  mbNone, mbLeft, mbMiddle, mbRight
MouseButtonAction {.pure.} = enum
  mbaNone, mbaPressed, mbaReleased
ScrollDirection {.pure.} = enum
  sdNone, sdUp, sdDown
Style = enum
  styleBright = 1,          ## bright text
  styleDim,                 ## dim text
  styleItalic,              ## italic (or reverse on terminals not supporting)
  styleUnderscore,          ## underscored text
  styleBlink,               ## blinking/bold text
  styleBlinkRapid,          ## rapid blinking/bold text (not widely supported)
  styleReverse,             ## reverse
  styleHidden,              ## hidden text
  styleStrikethrough         ## strikethrough
different styles for text output

  cnoBlink, cBlink, cSteady, cBlinkUnderline, cSteadyUnderline, cBlinkBar,
  cSteadyBar

proc clearScrool(line: Natural) {....raises: [IOError, ValueError],
                                  tags: [WriteIOEffect].}
scrolling up origine "{CSI}{nbr line}S" start first line very bad scrolling scrolling down origine "{CSI}{nbr line}T" start last line very bad scrolling

proc eraseDown() {....raises: [IOError, ValueError], tags: [WriteIOEffect].}
